  • SEARCH: 
 

Package ohos.data.search.model

Defines the basic data structure of the fusion search service. Related classes include:

  • ChangedIndexContent: wraps changed index data and invokes callbacks to notify index data changes.
  • IndexData: represents a container that stores index data. This class is used for adding, deleting, and updating indexes, as well as performing pagination search.
  • IndexForm: defines the index attribute. Your application must set the index attribute before performing indexing and search operations.
  • Recommendation: represents the group search result.
  • IndexType: represents the index type of an index attribute.
  • SearchableEntity: defines searchability meta-data for an Ability.
  • SearchErrorCode: provides error codes related to IndexForm.
  • SearchParameter: defines keywords of search types supported by fusion search.

Since:
3
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexType
    Represents the index type of an index attribute.
    SearchErrorCode
    Provides error codes related to IndexForm.
    SearchParameter
    Defines keywords of search types supported by fusion search.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangedIndexContent
    A wrapper class of changed indexes.
    IndexData
    Represents a container that stores index data.
    IndexForm
    Defines the attribute of an index field for fusion search.
    Recommendation
    Represents the group search result.
    SearchableEntity
    Defines searchability metadata for an ability.
